commands.name: prettier
commands.summary: Used by the pre-commit Git hook. This command invokes Prettier to reformat staged changes.

commands.name: ensure-consistent-versions
commands.summary: Ensure that package versions for released artifacts are consistent
commands.description: Ensure that package versions for released artifacts are consistent.

commands.name: switch-flavor:beta
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on beta version.
commands.shellCommand: rush install && cpy --flat common/config/env/beta.env common/config/env --rename .env && node common/scripts/invalidate-build.js

commands.name: switch-flavor:beta-release
commands.summary: Switch flavor to beta release mode (strip out in-progress features)
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on beta version.

commands.name: switch-flavor:stable
commands.description: Every build and test command will run based on stable version.
commands.shellCommand: rush install --variant stable && cpy --flat common/config/env/stable.env common/config/env --rename .env && node common/scripts/invalidate-build.js

commands.name: update:full
commands.summary: Update dependencies for all build flavours to latest SemVers.
commands.description: Updates dependendencies to latest SemVer for all build flavors. This update is more aggressive than a routine `rush update`.

commands.name: build:all-flavors
commands.summary: Build all packages for all flavors in one command
commands.description: Build all packages for all flavors in one command. This command will switch current flavor to beta.
commands.shellCommand: (rush switch-flavor:stable && rush rebuild) || rush switch-flavor:beta && rush rebuild

commands.name: build-api:all-flavors
commands.summary: Build all packages in all flavors, excluding samples and storybook, to update api files
commands.description: Build all packages in all flavors in one command, excluding samples and storybook, to update api files. This command will switch current flavor to beta.
commands.shellCommand: (rush switch-flavor:stable && rush rebuild -t @azure/communication-react) || rush switch-flavor:beta && rush rebuild -t @azure/communication-react

commands.name: build
commands.summary: Build all projects that haven't been built, or have changed since they were last built
commands.description: This command is similar to "rush rebuild", except this will only return non-zero when error happens not warnings.

commands.name: test
commands.description: Run jest tests in each project.

commands.name: build:watch
commands.summary: Trigger incremental build with watch command.

commands.name: prettier:check
commands.summary: Check prettier formatting in each project.
commands.description: Check prettier formatting in each project.

commands.name: clean
commands.summary: Delete build artifacts in each project.
commands.description: Delete build artifacts in each project.
